page.title: 14The Eastbourne Park.
page.content: The {Eastbourne Park} was first planned in 1967 and will eventually cover an area of nearly 1300 acres. 200 acres of this will be lakes and flood storage areas. These will provide facilities for all kinds of {water sports}and {leisure activities.} In addition there will be a {miniature {railway, horse trails, a small pets {corner}and {a 70 acre wildlife action {area.} Other attractions will be { {botanical gardens} and a permanent site for shows and carnivals. All age groups should be catered for with plenty of walks for the elderly and play areas for various age groups of children. {1000,000 trees will be planted. }The four main areas will be Broadwater, Southbourne, West Langney and Shinewater. The work will commence on the area behind the {District}Hospital
